description: To vary condition 2 attached to 14F/0829 (Erection of part 11, part 9 storey building comprising 123 student apartments and studios above 12,835 sq.ft of Class B1 creative workshop space at ground and first floor level) to provide for: a revised scheme comprising 150 units (66no. 3 bed clusters, 6 no. 3 bed duplexes and 78 studios) along with a revised layout for the communal area and service areas, revised layout of the workspace units and changes to the appearance of the Brick Street and Norfolk Street elevations.
site_address: Land between Norfolk Street and, Brick Street, Liverpool, L1 0BE
